snippet: Quarterback Everett Golson, who was suspended for the fall semester for what he termed “poor judgment on a test,” was readmitted to Notre Dame.
abstract: Quarterback Everett Golson returns to Notre Dame football team following one-semester suspension.
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Everett Golson, who was suspended for the fall semester for what he termed “poor judgment on a test,” was readmitted to Notre Dame.

headline.main: Golson Back With Irish Football Team
